item.title: Compile ruby with rbenv and brew-installed tcl-tk
item.description: It happens to be the case where I run into the need of using ruby and tk.Anyway, it tooks me a while to figure out how to compile a ruby by using rbenv and ruby-build with a brew-installed tcl-tk library.

item.title: Ruby Setup
item.description: Here I record what I did to install ruby on my macbook.
